description: FINISH Glass Magic Hardwater Performance Booster - This product contains up to 21 percent phosphate by weight, according to the label.
alternatives: Mix equal parts of borax and washing soda, but increase the washing soda if your water is hard.
If you want to use a commercial dishwashing soap, try CitraDish or Nellie's All-Natural diswasher powder, which contain no bleach or phosphates.
name: Dishwasher Soap
